data.meanings: Negative particle giving to the present the sense of the perfect; not.
data.sentence: The word أَلَمْ comes from the root ل م and is associated with the meanings: Negative particle giving to the present the sense of the perfect; not.

data.meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
data.sentence: The word تَكُنْ comes from the root ك و ن and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.

data.meanings: To follow, walk behind, imitate, pursue, consecutive. To read, recite, peruse, rehearse, declare, meditate.Sought repeatedly, collect.Bond or obligation.One who relieves or aids another in singing.
data.sentence: The word تُتْلَى comes from the root ت ل و and is associated with the meanings: To follow, walk behind, imitate, pursue, consecutive. To read, recite, peruse, rehearse, declare, meditate.Sought repeatedly, collect.Bond or obligation.One who relieves or aids another in singing.

data.meanings: To lie, say what is not a fact, lie to falsely invent, tell lies about or against, fabricate a lie, relate a lie, say a falsehood, be wrong, be cut off, deceive, disappoint the expectation of.
data.sentence: The word تُكَذِّبُونَ comes from the root ك ذ ب and is associated with the meanings: To lie, say what is not a fact, lie to falsely invent, tell lies about or against, fabricate a lie, relate a lie, say a falsehood, be wrong, be cut off, deceive, disappoint the expectation of.
